-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Native Haskell implementation of the interface from the erf package
--   
--   Native Haskell implementation of the interface from the erf package. I
--   have had problems getting the erf package to work on Windows systems,
--   so I'm throwing this one out there. It incorporates code translated
--   from GSL's C source, and so is licensed under the GPL.
@package erf-native
@version 1.0.0.1

module Data.Number.Erf

-- | Error function related functions.
--   
--   The derivative of <a>erf</a> is <tt> x -&gt; 2 / sqrt pi * exp
--   (x^2)</tt>, and this uniquely determines <a>erf</a> by <tt>erf 0 =
--   0</tt>.
--   
--   Minimal complete definition is <a>erfc</a> or <a>normcdf</a>.
class Floating a => Erf a
erf :: Erf a => a -> a
erfc :: Erf a => a -> a
erfcx :: Erf a => a -> a
normcdf :: Erf a => a -> a
instance Erf Float
instance Erf Double
